mapper.update:
update ehr_menu
menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_type = #{menuType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
menu_url = #{menuUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_user_name = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_modify_user_id = #{lastModifyUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
last_modify_user_name = #{lastModifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_modify_date = #{lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
menu_seq = #{menuSeq,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update ehr_menu set menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_type = #{menuType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, menu_url = #{menuUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_user_name = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_modify_user_id = #{lastModifyUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, last_modify_user_name = #{lastModifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_modify_date = #{lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, menu_seq = #{menuSeq,jdbcType=TINYINT} where menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select.if: SELECT * FROM ehr_menu WHERE menu_type=10 or menu_type=40 AND IS_DELETED = 0 order by menu_type,menu_id

SELECT a.* FROM ehr_menu a,ehr_role_power b WHERE a.menu_id=b.power_id AND a.IS_DELETED = 0 AND a.menu_type=30 AND b.type=1 AND exists(SELECT * FROM ehr_role_user c WHERE c.role_id=b.role_id AND c.user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}) union SELECT * FROM ehr_menu WHERE menu_type=40 AND IS_DELETED = 0
union SELECT * FROM ehr_menu WHERE menu_type=20 OR menu_type=40
order by menu_seq,menu_type,menu_id
